channel.title: images on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in images on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-14
item.description: Coinbase’s bouncing QR code Super Bowl ad was so popular it crashed the app (2 minute read) Coinbase’s Super Bowl ad was so popular its app temporarily crashed.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-13
item.description: Elon Musk says Tesla will stop accepting bitcoin for car purchases, citing environmental concerns (3 minute read) Tesla has suspended vehicle purchases using bitcoin due to concerns over the increasing use of fossil fuels for bitcoin mining.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-22
item.description: Samsung’s New Upcycling Program Allows You To Turn an Old Galaxy Phone Into a New IoT Device (3 minute read) Samsung is trying to help people convert old phones into new IoT devices with its new Galaxy Upcycling at Home service for users in the US, UK, and South Korea.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-15
item.description: Facebook details AI that can understand videos (6 minute read) Learning from Videos is a project from Facebook that uses AI to automatically learn audio, textual, and visual representations from videos.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-06
item.description: OpenAI’s DALL-E creates plausible images of literally anything you ask it to (5 minute read) OpenAI’s DALL-E is an AI that can generate images based on text descriptions.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-01
item.description: Google announces the Pixel 5 for $699 (3 minute read) The Google Pixel 5 will be available in eight countries on October 15th, then in the US on October 29th for $699.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-06
item.description: Samsung announces the Galaxy Z Fold 2 with bigger screens and better cameras (2 minute read) The new Galaxy Z fold 2 handset was officially announced at Samsung’s Unpacked event.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-17
item.description: Microsoft to launch xCloud streaming free with Xbox Game Pass Ultimate in September (6 minute read) Microsoft will launch xCloud free to its Xbox Game Pass Ultimate subscribers in September.
